schema.title: Summary of Taz on Shulchan Arukh, Yoreh De'ah
schema.key: Summary of Taz on Shulchan Arukh, Yoreh De'ah

enDesc: Summary of the commentary of the Taz (David ha-Levi Segal) on Shulchan Arukh, Yoreh De'ah. The name, "Taz", is an abbreviation of the author's most famous work, Turei Zahav. The Taz was an important rabbinic figure in Poland, c.1586 – 1667.
